means: 使成为奴隶( enslave的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They've been enslaved and had to do what they were told.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经沦为奴隶，不得不听从命令做事。

sentence.Network_en: George was born to an enslaved African mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔治的母亲是个非洲奴隶。

sentence.Network_en: They refused to be enslaved and rose in struggle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不甘心受奴役而起来斗争了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: They would not be conquered and enslaved without a struggle ., 他们不愿不作斗争就被征服并沦为奴隶.
Her drug addiction has completely enslaved her ., 吸毒成瘾完全使她身不由己.
Unfortunately , man had fallen , was enslaved by Satan and all had become corruptible ., 可惜却因人类始祖犯罪落在魔鬼黑暗权势中之后 , 一切情形就开始越来越坏.
enslave vt . enslaved , enslaving ., 使 . . . 成为奴隶 ; 奴役.

list.abs: all national institutions of churches , whether Jewish , Christian , or Turkish , appear to me no other than human inventions set up to terrify and enslave mankind , and monopolize power and profit .一切国家的教会机关，不论是犹太教的，基督教的或是土耳其教会的，在我看来，无非是人所创造出来的，建立的目的是在于恐
Gone forever are the days when the imperialists enslaved the Chinese people ., 帝国主义奴役中国人民的时代已经一去不复返了.
Her beauty enslaved many young men ., 她的美貌倾倒了很多青年男子.
Oh no , Warlocks enslave demons to fight by their side in combat ., 哦 , 不 , 术士奴役恶魔作战 , 他们在战斗中一边.

entry.def: To enslave someone means to make them into a slave.

example.ex: They've been enslaved and had to do what they were told...
example.tran: 他们已经沦为奴隶，不得不听从命令做事。

example.ex: I'd die myself before I'd let anyone enslave your folk ever again...
example.tran: 我死也不会让任何人再次奴役你们。

entry.def: To enslave a person or society means to trap them in a situation from which they cannot escape.

example.ex: ...the various cultures, cults and religions that have enslaved human beings for untold years...
example.tran: 束缚人类已久的各种文化、异教和宗教

example.ex: It would be a tragedy if both sexes were enslaved to the god of work.
example.tran: 如果男人和女人都被工作所束缚，那将会是一场悲剧。

auth_sentence.content: Very little is known about these enslaved men and women.
auth_sentence.res_content: Very little is known about these enslaved men and women.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Very little is known about these enslaved men and women.

auth_sentence.content: Women were allegedly raped and sexually enslaved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Women were allegedly raped and sexually enslaved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Women were allegedly raped and sexually enslaved.

auth_sentence.content: I was...enslaved by the beauty of Paris.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was...enslaved by the beauty of Paris.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was...enslaved by the beauty of Paris.
